sentences.sContent: Sometimes he had overacted in his role as Prince.
sentences.sCn: 有时，他把王子的角色过度演绎了。

remMethod.val: over(过度， 过分) + act(表演) → 把(角色)表演得过火

words.tran: 过于活跃的；活跃得不正常的
过于活泼，过度活跃；过度活性

trans.tranCn: 把表演得过火； 表现做作
trans.tranOther: to act in a play with too much emotion or movement – used to show disapproval
